channel.title: Hyperion, |herblore| pestle on objects method? (unicorn horn, etc.)
channel.description: Hey, i've ben trying to find a method for hyperion on pestle on an object. Anyone know a method or like something that'll help, i tried to make my own but, it is off by alot. But, can anyone please provide me a method for pestle on object like unicorn horn to dust so on so forth. please..

item.title: Hyperion, |herblore| pestle on objects method? (unicorn horn, etc.)

item.description:

http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Item_on_item

and

[quote=“Ares_, post:3, topic:443772”][quote author=shank beast link=topic=546450.msg4006015#msg4006015 date=1338651275]
Hey, i’ve ben trying to find a method for hyperion on pestle on an object. Anyone know a method or like something that’ll help, i tried to make my own but, it is off by alot. But, can anyone please provide me a method for pestle on object like unicorn horn to dust so on so forth. please…
[/quote]

I released full herblore for Hyperion in the snippet thread a while back so go search for it.[/quote]

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Wrong section. Since I’m here though,

Not that hard bro, just make a method somewhere, idc where. Then, in the item on item packet, make it call that method. I am working on herb atm, but cba to spoon-feed you with mine.
